verifySignerPermissionRequest((address,u.details: Verifies that a request is signed by an authorized account.

getAllActiveSigners().notice: Returns all signers with active permissions to use the account.

getAllAdmins().notice: Returns all admins of the account.

getAllSigners().notice: Returns all active and inactive signers of the account.

getPermissionsForSigner(address).notice: Returns the restrictions under which a signer can use the smart wallet.

isActiveSigner(address).notice: Returns whether the given account is an active signer on the account.

isAdmin(address).notice: Returns whether the given account is an admin.

setPermissionsForSigner((address,uint8,a.notice: Sets the permissions for a given signer.

documentation.text: @notice Emitted when permissions for a signer are updated.
@notice Emitted when an admin is set or removed.
@notice Returns whether the given account is an admin.
@notice Returns whether the given account is an active signer on the account.
@notice Returns the restrictions under which a signer can use the smart wallet.
@notice Returns all active and inactive signers of the account.
@notice Returns all signers with active permissions to use the account.
@notice Returns all admins of the account.
@dev Verifies that a request is signed by an authorized account.
@notice Sets the permissions for a given signer.
